content.rendered:
Coloring Book: Elmo New Friend is a sweet drawing game. Elmo is saying hello to a new fishy friend. How will you color this charming Elmo scene? You can switch the line color of the sketch, which is not available in other coloring games. Choose different paintbrushes to finish the picture. Choose different paintbrushes to finish the picture. For convenience, the coloring book is made specially.
On PC Click the left mouse button or tap the screen to draw.On mobile Use your finger to touch the screen.
